sources.name: Trial_comp0
sources.script:
source(output(
		ACTIVE as string,
		Address as string,
		State as string,
		City as string,
		Code as string,
		Name as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Zip_Code as string,
		Time_Zone_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Trial_comp0
